title: "mid or feed"
body:
1. These guys are so rude and uneducated, they just wanna waste teammates' time and points.
2. Even if u gave him/her mid, nothing's gonna change but "mid or feed" will turn to "mid and feed", always.
3. Cuz I never saw any guy who said this shht can play mid well. They r not good at both solo and teamfight.
4. How to punish these shhts except report and block them?
5. I don't wanna say "I hope these people can die right now", but such words would come outta my mind when I encountered 'em.
6. If they just wanna solo and kill, they can just go to play AI game. Oh, but I guess they can't beat the intermediate AI.
7. LMFAO.

replies.body:
the best option is basically dodge.
yes you lose lp but not the mmr, and mmr is all you need baby. 


or if you're super confident, go on with the game xd

underground or feed
is this why i have the most death in every game
i never say "mid or feed". i say "afk or feed"
"mid or feed" "top or feed" "jg or feed" etc. summoners can fucking kill themselves because they have no life.
um bud it  could be sed that we don't have a life as we play games
